content:
I'm so happy that you want to hear all this from me!
But I really can't think of anything else to talk about.
info: 特殊反馈-短时间内第八次对话-11蛮蛮_特殊反馈及引入语

content: (Looking around nervously) Of course we can chat, but you know what they say, "Hard work pays off, but play gets you nowhere." I really need to go clean the plum blossom stakes now—
info: 特殊反馈-短时间内第八次对话-11蛮蛮_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
Oh gosh—I'm so sorry!
If we keep chatting,
I won't be able to finish my plum stake polishing quota for today!
info: 特殊反馈-短时间内第八次对话-11蛮蛮_特殊反馈及引入语
